title: Ein Rhymisches Neus Jahr [A Rhythmical New Year]
description: Grid of 12 large squares filled with/composed of multi-colored sections of stripes. Black text from upper-middle left to lower-middle right and at bottom center. Text reads: "Ein rhythmisches Neues Jahr wunscht Ihnen Bosch Siebdruck AG, Oberstmuhle 3, 6371 Stans."
name: Poster
